alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 2:56PM EDT until April 26 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Aiken County in central South Carolina... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Aiken Municipal Airport, or 8 miles northeast of Aiken, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Aiken, Aiken Municipal Airport, Wagener, Perry, Perry Airport, Steedman, New Holland and Cedar Pond Campground. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 18 and 38. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
